column4: Correction: when I connect to the server via ssh, after entering the
username, the connection to the server goes down and the network card eth0 is no longer pingabile, but the server can ping the client.

I have two network cards, eht1 who has never had any problems, while eth0 from the problem described above. Trying another client gets the same problem, and that means' once you have inserted username, you log off
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
